# Code Analysis Docs

## Code analysis

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/overview.md): Learn about source code analysis in the .NET SDK.

## Code quality rules

- [Rule options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-quality-rule-options.md): Learn how to specify additional configuration options for code quality rules.
- [Predefined configurations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/predefined-configurations.md): Learn about using predefined editorconfig and rule set files to target specific types of code analysis.

## Code style rules

- [Rule options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-style-rule-options.md): Learn how to specify .NET code style options.

## Configuration

- [General options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/configuration-options.md): Learn how to configure code analysis rules in an analyzer configuration file.
- [Configuration files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/configuration-files.md): Learn about different configuration files, including editorconfig and global config files, to configure code analysis rules.
- [How to suppress warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/suppress-warnings.md): Learn the different ways you can suppress .NET code analysis violations.

## Rule reference

- [Categories](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/categories.md): Learn the different .NET code analysis rule categories.

## Children

- [Quality Rules](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/llms.txt)
- [Style Rules](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/code-analysis/style-rules/llms.txt)
